thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 4 of 112
thread.title: Marian

author: Marian
title: Marian
text: Inter Dry Dressing has been a God send. Works to wick away moisture in problem areas of the body. Its pricey since you cannot wash and reuse and difficult to fasten onto skin even with skin tape depending on the area of the body but loved ones are worth the price. HDIS offers a fair price on this product compared to other retailers. The customer service experience with HDIS was excellent and deserves mention. Customer Service Reps are friendly, knowledgeable and offer personal attention to our needs.
